metadata.title: Basic Feature-Outcome Baseline (Descriptive)
metadata.description: Descriptive characterization of the relationship between a small subset of Option B features and Option C outcomes for GBPUSD. No predictive claims, no strategy implications.
metadata.author: @ovc-research

filters.description: All GBPUSD blocks within the 2025 calendar year
filters.sql_fragment: WHERE instrument = 'GBPUSD' AND ts >= '2025-01-01' AND ts < '2026-01-01'
